mapper.select: select * from course a inner join syllabus b on a.syllabusID = b.syllabusID where a.courseID=#{courseID}

select courseID, s.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, coursePeopleMax, courseFee, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseStart, courseEnd, courseState from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID order by courseID desc

select courseID, c.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, courseRoomNumber, courseStart, courseEnd, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseTime, courseFee, coursePeopleMax, courseState, syllabusOutline, syllabusPurpose, syllabusTarget, syllabusContent from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseID = #{courseID}

select courseID, s.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, coursePeopleMax, courseFee, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseStart, courseEnd, courseState, (courseApplyEnd - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) as dday from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseApplyStart <= sysdate and sysdate <= courseEnd order by decode(courseState, '접수중', 1, '조기마감', 2, 3), dday asc

select courseID, c.syllabusID, s.syllabusCategory1, s.syllabusCategory2, s.syllabusName, courseRoomNumber, courseStart, courseEnd, courseApplyStart, courseApplyEnd, courseTime, courseFee, coursePeopleMax, courseState, syllabusOutline, syllabusPurpose, syllabusTarget, syllabusContent, (courseApplyEnd - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) as dday from course c join syllabus s on c.syllabusID = s.syllabusID where courseID = #{courseID}
mapper.insert: insert into course (courseid, syllabusid, coursestart, courseend, courseapplystart, courseapplyend, coursetime, coursefee, courseroomnumber, coursepeoplemax) values(course_seq.NEXTVAL, #{syllabusID}, TO_DATE(#{courseStart}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseEnd}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseApplyStart}, 'YY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{courseApplyEnd}, 'YY-MM-DD'),#{courseTime},#{courseFee},#{courseRoomNumber},#{coursePeopleMax})
mapper.update: update course set courseState='조기마감' where courseid = #{courseID}
update course set courseState='접수중' where courseid = #{courseID}
update course set coursepeopleapplied = coursepeopleapplied+1 where courseid=#{courseID}
update course set coursestate = '마감' where (courseid in (select courseid from course where courseapplyend < sysdate))
